document.heading: Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act of 1980 Clarifying Temporary Amendment Act of 1991

history.narrative: Law 9-64, the “Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act of 1980 Clarifying Temporary Amendment Act of 1991,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-322. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 1, 1991, and November 5, 1991, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 25, 1991, it was assigned Act No. 9-107 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
